column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////After a wonderful weekend in Chicago this was my families last stop on our restaurant tour
column2: glad we did!! The Chorizo Eggs Benedict were sensational as were the Berry Bliss Pancakes. Hash Browns were cooked to perfection
column3: My mother also had 2 of the Vanilla Latte's
column4: couldn't get enough. The only negative is that we had to wait 40 min
